# Natural logarithm of π

> Natural logarithm of the mathematical constant [π][pi].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var LN_PI = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-ln-pi' );
```

#### LN_PI

Natural logarithm of the mathematical constant [π][pi].

```javascript
var bool = ( LN_PI === 1.1447298858494002 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
